sentences.en: A tsar was a living icon, invested with deep historical and religious significance.
sentences.cn: 沙皇曾是活着的圣像，具有深远的历史和宗教意义。

sentences.en: An ACTIVE RCS is represented by the green icon, as shown above.
sentences.cn: ACTIVERCS用绿色的图标表示, 如上所示.

sentences.en: Click on the printer icon with the mouse.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标点击打印机图标。

sentences.en: Click on this icon to align or justify text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个图标使文本排齐。

sentences.en: Click the square icon again to minimize the window.
sentences.cn: 再次点击正方形图标，把窗口最小化。

sentences.en: Displays a message box with specified text, caption, buttons, and icon.
sentences.cn: 显示具有指定文本 、 标题 、 按钮和图标的消息框.

sentences.en: Dot - matrix alphanumeric strings if not show identification, the VC available ICON resources to determine the editor.
sentences.cn: 点阵字母显示字串如果不好确定, 可用VC++中的ICON资源编辑器来确定.

sentences.en: Find the Network Manager icon in the notification area.
sentences.cn: 在通知区域找到网络管理器图标.

sentences.en: Only Marilyn has proved as enduring a fashion icon.
sentences.cn: 只有玛丽莲是常青的时尚偶像。

sentences.en: People shelve the out - of - fashion moral icon and espouse the philosophy of egoism.
sentences.cn: 搁置了人民的时尚图标和拥护道德哲学的利己主义.

sentences.en: Save desktop icon position, when necessary, restored to original location.
sentences.cn: 保存桌面图标的位置, 需要时可以恢复到原位置.

sentences.en: The icon file is added to your project as a content file.
sentences.cn: 该图标文件将作为内容文件添加到项目中.

sentences.en: To open a new file, click on the icon.
sentences.cn: 要打开新文档，点击该图标。

sentences.en: You are online ( proxy: manual ). Click the icon to go offline.
sentences.cn: 您现在联机 ( 代理: 手动 ). 点击此图标即可脱机.

sentences.en: You should see the OpenOffice. org icon in the Applications folder.
sentences.cn: 您应该在应用程序文件夹里看到OpenOffice. org图标.

sentences.en: You yi si , I mean , the head icon is interesting.
sentences.cn: 你搞研究搞晕头了吧,一下子拼音, 一下子洋文的.

words.tran_cn: 打破旧习的；偶像破坏的
图标；偶像；肖像，画像；圣像

trans.tran_cn: 偶像，崇拜对象，图标，图符，[宗]圣像，肖像
trans.tran_en: a small sign or picture on a computer screen that is used to start a particular operation
